string.text: The diggers have found some good stuff here but we're running low on supplies and we can't afford to send anyone back for resupply while we're camped here. If you can bring us some stuff, we'll be sure to share some of the artifacts we've found.
There's a weird anomaly here. The fuel station never seems to run out. Sometimes it's empty, and then there's more the next day. Well, it keeps our lights on, at least, and we're happy to share.
The pigs here make for good eating. We're willing to share some food if you have ammo we can use to take them down.
I have some ideas on how to upgrade and modify stalker suits. If you have any suits you want changed, bring them here and I'll see what I can do.
Looks good, stalker! Wear it well.
I do most of the work in the area for maintaining suits. Let me know if you want to swap parts.
